Sleep
Sleep until all inner actions succeed
On this page
Sleep until all inner actions succeed
This will sleep until all actions directly inside of this action succeed. This will not check actions inside of those actions.
tip
By default it will timeout after 60 seconds if a max time isn't provided.
Parameters
â€‹
Max time (seconds) (number)
Previous
Sleep until timer is finished
Next
Sleep until any inner action succeeds
Parameters
